scripts.zip: npm run build && cd .. && zip -r anima-wp-blocks.zip anima-wp-blocks -x "anima-wp-blocks/node_modules/*" "anima-wp-blocks/src/*" "anima-wp-blocks/*.git*" "anima-wp-blocks/*.zip" "anima-wp-blocks/package.json" "anima-wp-blocks/package-lock.json" "anima-wp-blocks/blocks/*" "anima-wp-blocks/webpack.config.js" "anima-wp-blocks/.babelrc" "anima-wp-blocks/.gitignore" "anima-wp-blocks/.editorconfig" "anima-wp-blocks/.eslintrc.json" "anima-wp-blocks/.stylelintignore" "anima-wp-blocks/.stylelintrc.json" "anima-wp-blocks/README.md"
